app module

class app.Prompts(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

A model representing writing prompts in a database.

Parameters:

  • uID (int) – The unique identifier for each prompt.

  • name (str) – The name of the prompt.

  • orga (str) – The organization associated with the prompt.

  • kw (str) – The keywords associated with the prompt.

  • length (str) – The desired length of the written piece.

  • tone (str) – The desired tone of the written piece.

  • gen_prompt (str) – The actual writing prompt.

  • rating (int) – The average rating for the prompt, default is 0.

gen_prompt
kw
length
name
orga
query: t.ClassVar[Query]

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

app.ad_prompts(name, orga, kw, length)[source]

Generates advertisement prompts based on user input and renders the ad_prompts page.

Renders the final_page template and handles the rating submission.

Prints the information of all prompts in the database.

app.take_prompt(index)[source]

Adds a new prompt to the database and redirects to the final_page.
